text_block_list.text: While training for the 'Japanese Derby', Matikanetannhauser hears about Rice Shower's feelings of admiration for Mihono Bourbon.
Meanwhile, at the academy, several reporters have come to interview Mihono Bourbon. Among them is a dejected-looking reporter with round glasses.
Matikanetannhauser tells the reporters, who expect no future other than her winning, that 'articles other than Bourbon won't be read.'
'It's true I'm not special at all—but I don't want anything other than first place either!'
Her somewhat passionate words convey her feelings... and seem to have struck a chord with the troubled-looking reporter with round glasses.
